liquids.name: Water
liquids.description: Essential liquid for plant growth and hydration!

liquids.name: Chloro-Juice
liquids.description: Why would you need this? It smells like pure freshness, at least

liquids.name: Lumi-Nectar
liquids.description: Strange, glowing slime with no scent. It remains luminous for several hours after harvest, but emits no warmth
